snippet.title: American Commando - Demo Release Trailer #indiegame #pc #fps
snippet.description:
🎮 ADD TO YOUR STEAM WISHLIST NOW!
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1605420/American_Commando/

American Commando is a retro 3D first-person shooter set in an alternative history of the 2nd World War. Kill hordes of Nazis, explore the mysteries of the Wunderwaffe, unveil the sinister truth behind top secret projects and... bring back 1000 Nazi scalps!

Developer: Iron Wolf Studio S.A.
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/ironwolfstudio
Twitter: https://twitter.com/I_W_Studio
WWW: https://www.ironwolfstudio.com

#pc #steam #indiegame #gamedev #gaming #fps #retrogaming #videogame #war
